title: Zenland
author: Zenland
created_time: August 23, 2023, 12:54:45 PMLast edit: April 03, 2024, 10:15:57 AM by Zenland
content: Hello BitcoinTalk!Zenland is an Ethereum-powered smart-contract platform (EVM-compatible) that revolutionizes the way we use escrow smart contracts for digital product and service transactions. Our mission is to let everyone buying or selling online get their orders delivered and payments sent ensuring fair, transparent, and secure value exchange.At the moment, Zenland escrow smart contracts can be deployed to Ethereum, Polygon, Binance Smart Chain, Gnosis, Avalanche, and Fantom networks.Official Announcement Thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404516.0Platform Reviews by BitcoinTalk: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5426986.0Whitepaper: https://zen.land/static/pdf/whitepaper.pdfCounter:...Week 2 (6 September, 2023 - 12 September, 2023)Week 3 (13 September, 2023 - 19 September, 2023)Week 4 (20 September, 2023 - 26 September, 2023)Week 5 (27 September, 2023 - 3 October, 2023)➡ temporarily paused ⬅ Week 6 (4 October, 2023 - 10 October, 2023)Week 7 (11 October, 2023 - 17 October, 2023)Week 8 (18 October, 2023 - 24 October, 2023)...How it Works:1. Users submit applications.2. We post a list of accepted users on 28 August.3. Accepted users have 48 hours to wear the signatures and avatars. The campaign begins on 30 August at 00:00 UTC.4. Participants who chose currencies other than BTC will sign in to Zenland and approve escrow contracts for each week on Wednesdays. Participants who chose BTC can skip this step.5. At the end of each week, those participants get paid through escrow contracts. And participants who chose BTC will get paid to their BTC wallet directly. How to Apply:Post in this thread the following details:1. BitcoinTalk username2. BitcoinTalk profile link3. Preferred network for payment (BTC, BSC, Polygon, Gnosis, or Avalanche)4. Preferred currency for payment (BTC, USDT, USDC, or BUSD)5. Wallet address (must be Metamask if you choose any currency but BTC)Pay Attention If You Didn't Choose BTC! After submitting your application, you need to log in to Zenland using the same Metamask address you submitted in your application. This is necessary for us to create escrow contracts if you are accepted.Rates/Slots:Legendary and Hero Members: - $2.5 per post (20 max posts per week will be paid)Senior Members: - $2 per post (20 max posts per week will be paid)Full Members: - $1 per post (20 max posts per week will be paid)Rules: before application:1.1. Do not have legitimate negative feedback.1.2. Have at least 5 merits received in the last 120 days.1.3. Apply from one (real) account. 1.4. Have a Full Member or higher account rank.if accepted:2.1. Wear the signature and never remove it until you stop participating in the campaign.2.2. Do not change the signature design.2.3. Make a minimum of 2 eligible posts each day.2.4. Make a minimum of 10 eligible posts each week.2.5. Posts must be at least 150 characters long and constructive.2.6. Posts in Local, Gambling, bounty threads, and signature campaigns will not count.Rules are subject to change. Even though every change will be announced in a new post, checking the rules carefully before approving the contract for each week is highly recommended.Signatures:Full MemberZ E N L A N D          ►► black][b][color=#fff][size=12pt]W E B S I T E[/size][/font][/sup][/size].[/td][/center]Avatar Design:Code:https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/08/26/Mo7VJ.pngReferral Link Incentive (optional):All accepted participants are also eligible for a 50% referral commission through our Referral Program. In this case, your signature will contain your referral link.To get your referral link you should:1. Go to Zenland at https://app.zen.land.2. Sign in with the Metamask wallet you submitted in your application.3. Tap on the Referrals button on the left-side panel and copy your referral URL link.4. Add it to your signature.When someone goes through your referral link, and top-ups their Zenland wallet, half of the top-up amount is automatically credited to your Zenland account which you can withdraw to your Metamask anytime without any commission fees.Please note that any and all violations of the above rules will result in negative feedback and removal from the signature campaign. We also reserve the right to choose members and adjust campaign rules at our discretion.

comments.created_time: August 23, 2023, 12:55:17 PMLast edit: October 03, 2023, 01:30:36 PM by Zenland
comments.body: ...August 28, 2023. Campaign start date has been adjusted. Now, the first week of the campaign starts on Wednesday, August 30 at 00:00 UTC.August 28, 2023. The first batch of accepted users is announced. The total number of seats for each rank category is changed to 4 Legendary & Hero, 4 Senior, and 10 Full Members from 5-5-3. 1 Legendary & Hero, 2 Senior, and 3 Full Member open seats are available.August 29, 2023. The campaign spreadsheet has been created and added to the OP. It's the first link under the banner graphic. Quick link.September 5, 2023. Week 1 payments have been sent out. We have 2 Senior Member and 4 Full Member seats are available!September 12, 2023. Week 2 payments have been sent out. We have 2 Senior Member and 2 Full Member seats are available!September 19, 2023. Week 3 payments have been sent out. We have 1 Hero & Legendary, 1 Senior, and 3 Full Member seats available!September 26, 2023. Week 4 payments have been sent out. We have 1 Hero & Legendary, 3 Senior, and 3 Full Member seats available!October 3, 2023. Week 5 payments have been sent out. The campaign is temporarily paused.
